answers.answer: Hi!Blurred vision can be due to glaucoma, refractive errors (near or far sightedness), diabetes, retinal detachment, optic stroke, infection or injury to eye, migraines, floaters, brain tumors, temporal arteritis or due to bleeding into the eye.I know you have undergone extensive diagnostic tests. Please go over all these possibilities one by one with your treating doctor.Take care!

question: I have experienced spells where I see the room full of smoke, I went out doors and the smoke was still there, I have been seeing a eye surgen,and he has run many test and has found no real answer. One idea is restricted blood flow to the head area,we done a ct scan and a mri he seen no real cause. other thoughts were I could be having minnie strokes. please give me your thoughts. thanks,mel ***@****
title: eye problems,smokey random vision
